ExecWithOptions
execWithOptions
. Executing a part of code with the options specified.
Purpose
: Executing a part of the code with the DISABLE_RECALC_PORTFOLIO_OPT option specified (disable portfolio recalculation) = true.
Syntax
:
Parameters
:
– the "Disable portfolio recalculation" option = true
Code block – part of the code that needs to be executed without recalculating the portfolio
The function is used to work with algorithms of the
Calculation module
.
